QuestData.Title: A Meeting With The Magister
QuestData.Description: I've placed an enchantment on the tabard that should allow you to slip past the Sunreaver Sanctuary's defenses for a short period of time. You should have enough time to find your way into The Filthy Animal and meet up with the Sunreaver contact there, one Magister Hathorel.$B$BObtain the copy of Ancient Dragonforged Blades that his men borrowed from Wyrmrest while your disguise holds, and return it to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Ancient Dragonforged Blades tome from Magister Hathorel.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work. Now that this is in our hands, we must get it to Caladis Brightspear as soon as possible. We can't risk the book falling back into Sunreaver hands.$BI'll ensure that Shandy Glossgleam gets his tabard back without incident, along with a healthy reward for his help
